title: Murder Mindfully
description: When mafia lawyer Björn attends a mindfulness class to find a better work-life balance, he discovers surprising new coping strategies — including murder.

title: The Cage
description: Dreaming of going pro, a young fighter struggles to be seen until an unexpected face-off lands him a shot at the big time — and a ruthless rivalry.

title: Dandadan
description: In a bet to prove whether ghosts or aliens exist, two high schoolers face terrifying paranormal threats, gain superpowers and maybe even fall in love?!

title: Don't Come Home
description: A mother must confront dark secrets from the past when her young daughter mysteriously vanishes after they move into her family’s eerie old mansion.

title: Bank Under Siege
description: Spain, 1981: When armed men hold up a bank and take hundreds hostage, a reporter races against the authorities to uncover the true motive for the heist.

title: Go Ahead, Brother
description: A dismissed special ops officer struggles to adapt to his new role in retail security — until he spots a way to solve his financial troubles.

title: The Law According To Lidia Poet
description: As Lidia continues to advocate for equality, the arrival of a new prosecutor shakes her world and Enrico considers a major change in his vocation.

title: Demon Slayer
description: Tanjiro and the Demon Slayer Corps begin intense training with the highest-ranking swordsmen, the Hashira. Will they be ready in time for the showdown?

title: Little Dino School
description: Learn numbers, colors and the ABCs with little dinosaur friends Rex, Brie, Vella and Pete as they tell delightful stories and sing catchy tunes.

title: Dragon Ball Daima
description: Mysteriously transformed into mini versions of themselves, Goku and his friends travel to the Demon Realm to uncover the truth and find a cure.
